CREATE TABLE ayet (
    ayet_id         INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,
    ayet_mealno     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    ayet_sureno     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    ayet_ayetno     INTEGER NOT NULL,
    ayet_metin      TEXT NOT NULL
);
CREATE INDEX ayet_mealno ON ayet(ayet_mealno);
CREATE INDEX ayet_sureno ON ayet(ayet_sureno);
CREATE INDEX ayet_ayetno ON ayet(ayet_ayetno);
